name: Qbic
description: Qbic is an indie puzzle game. Cubes drop with different colours on each of their faces. In order to score points, you have to rotate the cubes and create lines of 4 or greater of the same colour on the front, thus destroying them. You lose when their are cubes stacked all the way to the top of the screen. Score combos or squares of a colour to gain bonuses and destroy extra blocks.
